metadata.title: CVE-2022-48638 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cgroup: cgroup_get_from_id() must check the looked-up kn is a directorycgroup has to be one kernfs dir, otherwise kernel panic is caused,especially cgroup id is provide from userspace.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
